name: Industry Article Analysis
description: Using OpenAI To Perform Text Summarization, Topic Modeling & Translation

appStages.name: Introduction
Content Summarization
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eContent Summarization\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e You can upload the document you want to summarize. Click on \u0027Load Article\u0027 once it is uploaded and start the process by pressing \u0027Summarize\u0027. The summary will be generated in the response text area below.\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Prompts",
      "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "defaultValue": {
        "system": true,
        "user": true,
        "tryUsingSomeAdditionalPositiveWordsFromTheListKeywords": true
      },
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "YOU ARE A GOOD CONTENT SUMMARIZER",
          "value": "system",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Write a concise summary of the following: \"{textContent}\"",
          "value": "user",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "prompts",
      "type": "selectboxes",
      "input": true,
      "inputType": "checkbox"
    },
    {
      "label": "GPT Model",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "gpt-4o-mini",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "model",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Max Tokens",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "max_tokens",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true,
      "defaultValue": "8000"
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload Article",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Article Content",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "textContent",
      "type": "textarea",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Content Summary",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true,
      "rows": 4
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {
                  "components": [
                    {
                      "label": "Summarize",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "customClass": "float-right rounded",
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "summarize",
                      "properties": {
                        "successMessage": "Summary is Completed"
                      },
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "gen-ai",
                      "input": true
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Load Article",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "block": true,
                      "customClass": "rounded float-right btn-outline",
                      "disabled": true,
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "read",
                      "properties": {
                        "updateTo": "textContent",
                        "uploadType": "pdf",
                        "execute": "true",
                        "successMessage": "File is Uploaded"
                      },
                      "logic": [
                        {
                          "name": "Enable Button",
                          "trigger": {
                            "type": "javascript",
                            "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"
                          },
                          "actions": [
                            {
                              "name": "Enable action",
                              "type": "property",
                              "property": {
                                "label": "Disabled",
                                "value": "disabled",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "state": false
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      ],
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "read-file",
                      "input": true
                    }
                  ],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                }
              ],
              "key": "columns1",
              "type": "columns",
              "input": false,
              "tableView": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Go Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline mt-0 float-left rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Next",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "next",
              "type": "button",
              "input": true,
              "event": "next"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}

appStages.name: Topic Extraction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eTopic Extraction\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e You can upload the document you wish to extract topics from. Click on \u0027Load Article\u0027 once it is uploaded. Press \u0027Extract Topic\u0027 to start the extraction process. A concise list of topics will be generated in the response text area below.\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Prompts",
      "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "defaultValue": {
        "system": true,
        "user": true
      },
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "YOU ARE A HELPFUL ASSISTANT",
          "value": "system",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Extract only the most important key topics being discussed in the below content. Only focus on exact keywords and not phrases.  Return list of 10 most important key words in a bullet list Content: \"{textContent}\"",
          "value": "user",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "prompts",
      "type": "selectboxes",
      "input": true,
      "inputType": "checkbox"
    },
    {
      "label": "GPT Model",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "gpt-4o-mini",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "model",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Max Tokens",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "8000",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "max_tokens",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload Article",
      "description": ".PDF files only",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Article Content",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "textContent",
      "type": "textarea",
      "rows": 5,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Key Topics Extracted",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "rows": 4,
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {
                  "components": [
                    {
                      "label": "Extract Topic",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "customClass": "float-right rounded",
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "submit",
                      "properties": {
                        "successMessage": "Topic is Extracted"
                      },
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "gen-ai",
                      "input": true
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Load Article",
                      "action": "event",
                      "showValidations": false,
                      "theme": "info",
                      "customClass": "float-right rounded btn-outline",
                      "disabled": true,
                      "tableView": false,
                      "key": "read",
                      "properties": {
                        "updateTo": "textContent",
                        "uploadType": "pdf",
                        "successMessage": "File is Uploaded",
                        "execute": "true"
                      },
                      "logic": [
                        {
                          "name": "Enable button",
                          "trigger": {
                            "type": "javascript",
                            "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"
                          },
                          "actions": [
                            {
                              "name": "Enable action",
                              "type": "property",
                              "property": {
                                "label": "Disabled",
                                "value": "disabled",
                                "type": "boolean"
                              },
                              "state": false
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      ],
                      "type": "button",
                      "event": "upload",
                      "input": true
                    }
                  ],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                }
              ],
              "key": "columns1",
              "type": "columns",
              "input": false,
              "tableView": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Go Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline float-left",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Next",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "next",
              "type": "button",
              "input": true,
              "event": "next"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",

      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}

appStages.name: Translation
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eTranslation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e You can upload the PDF file you wish to translate. Press \u0027Translate\u0027 to begin the translation process. The translated content is shown after processing.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Prompts",
      "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "YOU ARE A HELPFUL and SKILLED TRANSLATOR",
          "value": "system",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Translate the Content: \"{textContent}\" into a \"{language}\" language",
          "value": "user",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "prompts",
      "type": "selectboxes",
      "input": true,
      "inputType": "checkbox",
      "defaultValue": {
        "system": true,
        "user": true
      }
    },
    {
      "label": "GPT Model",

      "input": true

        {
          "label": "",

      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Select Language",

      "tableView": false,
      "defaultValue": "french",
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "French",
          "value": "french",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Spanish",
          "value": "spanish",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "English",
          "value": "english",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Chinese",
          "value": "chinese",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "language",
      "type": "radio",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Translated Article ",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true,
      "rows": 4
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",

        },

                {
